message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CC

This paper discusses the use of rhetorical relations for natural language processing tasks, specifically in the context of information retrieval. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing. The paper also focuses on information retrieval, which suggests cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as another likely sub-category. The use of language models and empirical evaluation suggests cs.LG (Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as possible sub-categories. Finally, the modification of the language model could also fall under cs.CC (Computational Complexity and Cryptography).
